entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY THIS MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH THIS AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
